The nerdiest nerd in nerd-town

13 Jun 2007

Kyle Purdy is a nerd among nerds. In the best possible way. I filmed an interview with him for Planet Nerd as he was about to make his way in to the keynote address as a VIP guest of Steve Jobs.

Dan Walmsley
CTO, NationBuilder
